name: My Zone Active
info:
Zone Active
 
ZA is a contact and motion sensor aggregator. 

It will transmit the active message when a motion sensor goes active or when a contact sensor changes state. 

 After a configurable delay, it will transmit a  deactivated message.
 
 Contact sensors are considered disabled after the "sensor reset delay " elapsed time passes. 
 
 Sensor reset delay and activity reset delay are in seconds.

name: Set the target color temperature for the house
auto shut off main floor lights
if it's not between sunset and sunrise, abort and cancel any pending loops
Motion Aggregator
When a device is turned on, check if it's a CT bulb
When the CT target is updated, pull and update all active bulbs
Count motion events and transmit both enabled and disabled messages
